```diff
+                       day: 'numeric'

+                       {item.title}
+                     </h3>
+                   </div>
+                 </Link>
+               ))}
+             </div>
+           </div>
+         )}
+       </div>
      </div>
    );
```

---

I've updated the individual image page to match the modern black theme from the gallery page. The changes include:

1. Changed the background to black to match the gallery page
2. Updated all UI elements with darker colors:
   - Dark gray backgrounds (gray-900, gray-950) for cards
   - Light gray text (gray-200, gray-300, gray-400) for better contrast
   - Indigo accent colors instead of blue for buttons and hover states
   - Darker borders (border-gray-800) for cards and containers

3. Enhanced the visual appearance with:
   - Improved shadows (shadow-lg instead of shadow-sm)
   - More saturated icon colors
   - Updated the AI badge with an indigo-themed color scheme
   - Enhanced hover effects for interactive elements

All functionality remains the same, but the design now matches the modern dark theme of the gallery page for a consistent user experience.

---
